Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 46th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/2015, off Shayne Funk (MON)...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2015, hitting .274 with 13 HR, 63 RBI...
Injured on 6/22/2016 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2017, hitting .417 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/30/2017 with a Pulled Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2017, hitting .441 with 6 HR, 22 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2017, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,510,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2018, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2018, hitting .375 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,510,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/7/2019 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/24/2019 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 8/17/2019 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 8/27/2019...
Injured on 9/18/2019 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/2/2020 to a 5-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/24/2020 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Injured on 9/8/2020 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
